text.english: A tenting request is already on file for you and is listed below. If you wish to change your tenting status, you can do so by clicking on the ' 2-day Participants Review/Update Tenting Status' button located at the end of the Online Check-In Process. You can also go to the Participant Centre and click the 'View or modify tenting information' link.

If you will be staying at camp on Saturday night please select a tenting option below. If you select a specific tent mate you will receive a confirmation email once they have accepted your invitation to tent together. If you would like us to assign you a tent mate or will not be staying at camp please click the appropriate button below. Tent assignments will be emailed to you the Thursday before the event.

If you are a member of a team that is officially registered with The Ride, you will be assigned neighboring tents with your team members who complete Online Check-In by June 3rd, 2015. Any team members who do not complete Online Check-In by this date are not guaranteed to be tenting near their team.

Need help? If you are having trouble finding your tent mate in the system, try entering just a few letters of their first or last name. Participants who have already confirmed a tent mate will not appear in the search results.
Choose your tenting option below. You can choose a RANDOM tent assignment, DECLINE a tent assignment or SEARCH for a tent mate.
